31  virtual void newModule(int moduleId, const boost::uuids::uuid &spawnUuid, const std::string &moduleName) = 0;

36  Known = 1,

38  Killed = 4,
39  Quit = 8,
40  Busy = 16,
41  };

53  int toId, const std::string &toName) = 0;

58  virtual void info(const std::string &text, message::SendText::TextType textType, int senderId, int senderRank, message::Type refType, const message::uuid_t &refUuid) = 0;

146  typedef std::map<std::string, std::shared_ptr<Parameter>> ParameterMap;
147  typedef std::map<int, std::string> ParameterOrder;
148  struct Module {
149  int id;
150  int hub;
151  bool initialized;
152  bool killed;
153  bool busy;
154  std::string name;
155  ParameterMap parameters;
156  ParameterOrder paramOrder;
157  int height; //< length of shortest path to a sink
158  std::string statusText;
159  message::UpdateStatus::Importance statusImportance = message::UpdateStatus::Bulk;
160  unsigned long statusTime = 0;
161 
162  message::ObjectReceivePolicy::Policy objectPolicy;
163  message::SchedulingPolicy::Schedule schedulingPolicy;
164  message::ReducePolicy::Reduce reducePolicy;
165 
166  int state() const;
167  bool isSink() const { return height==0; }
168  Module(int id, int hub): id(id), hub(hub), initialized(false), killed(false), busy(false), height(0),
169  objectPolicy(message::ObjectReceivePolicy::Local), schedulingPolicy(message::SchedulingPolicy::Single), reducePolicy(message::ReducePolicy::Locally)
170  {}
171  };
